name: Book Of Lore
description: Revealing secrets about the new world, the Dunes of Trakan, this collection consists of leather books which can receive 10 pages. Collect them and get to know the mysterious world we are about to conquer.\nJoin the conquest to explore the [new world](https://x.com/EVRL00T).\nGet to know the Evrlooters and be part of an [epic journey](https://discord.com/invite/Meq3cSdgem).
